original_title: Harry Birrell Presents: Films of Love & War
overview: A documentary about Harry Birrell, an amateur film-maker who documented his life extensively on film. The documentary focuses specifically on the films he shot, and diary entries he wrote during the pre-war and wartime years.
tagline: From the streets of 1930s Glasgow to the battlefields of World War II
title: Harry Birrell Presents: Films of Love & War
